acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Elizabeth Bouvier in 1998. The accession number associated with this gift is 1998.009.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Randall B. "Pete" Smith (1917-1989) served in Abraham Lincoln Brigade during Spanish Civil War, and later moved to New York where he was a radical activist within the National Maritime Union in the 1930s and 1940s. Smith subsequently worked as marketing executive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes Marine Workers Historical Association minutes and correspondence; autobiographical transcripts; correspondence and other materials.
